name: CyBear Jinni Smart Home
description:
🦾🐼🧞‍♂️🏡 CyBear Jinni is a Smart Home company.
Our goal is to raise the quality of life for everyone by making advance Smart Home devices in affordable price and simple user interface.
CyBear Jinni allows you to control the devices while keeping your privacy private and with priority for local control over the devices.
